#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    ll test;
    cin >> test;
    while(test--) {
        string s, ans;
        ll m;
        cin >> s;
        cin >> m;
        ll n, i, j, k;
        n = s.size();
        k = n - m + 1;
        ans.resize(n);
        j = m - 1;
        for(i = j; i < n; i++)
            ans[i-j] = s[i];
        //cout << ans << endl;
        if((m % 2 != 0 && n % 2 == 0) || (m % 2 == 0 && n % 2 != 0) ) {
            for(i = 0; i < j; i++) {
                ans[k+i] = s[i];
            }
        }
        else {
            for(i = 0; i < j; i++) {
                ans[k+i] = s[m-2-i];
            }
        }
        cout << ans << endl;

    }
    return 0;
}
